Header: REQUEST TO DISPLAY NATIONAL FLAG FOR ONE WEEK
Content: The Ministry of Home Affairs has requested all Sri Lankans to display the national flag for one week parallel to the 69 th Independence Celebrations. The ministry has requested to display the national flag in all homes, shops, state and private sector offices and on vehicles for one week parallel to the Independence Day celebrations. The Independence Day will be proudly celebrated this year with the theme as National Unity at Galle Face Green.
